text: Yi Ryang (, 1519 1583) was a politician and philosopher during the Korean Joseon Dynasty. Lee was a member of the royal family of the Joseon Dynasty. He was a descendant of Prince Hyoryeongs and uncle of Queen Insun, wife of Myeongjong of Joseon. In 1546 he passed to Saengwon and Chinsa exam and passed to Imperial examination in 1552. == Works == * Yongsailgi (龍蛇日記 용사일기) * Munsuji (文殊志 문수지) * Saseonggangmok (四姓綱目 사성강목) == Other websites == * Lee Lyang * Lee Lyang * Lee Lyang Category:1519 births Category:1583 deaths Category:Korean educators Category:Korean politicians Category:Korean autobiographers
title: Yi Ryang
